edited_stories.edited_story_text: I took my family out for a winter hike as the sun was setting. We were all so happy to be together. The kids in particular were really excited as we parked and prepared to set out. It's surprisingly fun to go hiking in the winter. You really can't get how beautiful the scenery was through these photographs, you need to see it for yourself.
